lead_paragraph: A simpler alternative to transistors, the memristor, will allow for more computer memory in even smaller devices.
snippet: A simpler alternative to transistors, the memristor, will allow for more computer memory in even smaller devices.

headline.main: H.P. to Work With Hynix on New Computer Memory Chips
headline.seo: H.P. and Hynix to Work on Memristor Memory Chips
